item.title: The Rabbit or Turtle
item.description: The Rabbit and The Turtle We all have heard of this Aesop “The Rabbit and The Turtle". It is a story where a turtle despite being slow challenges rabbit for a race and rabbit out of overconfidence, stop to take a nap and lost it. The moral behind this story was “Slow and Steady wins the race”. Most of you must have heard this story only up to here, let me tell you my friends, it was just a trailer.
